entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
